data.title: Radio Stations in Revolution
authors: Contributors to Grand Theft Auto Fanon Wiki
data.meta_description: Radio Stations and Music play a big part in Grand Theft Auto Revolution. Radio Stations can be accesed on the players phone through the Sound Wave app. 810 LVN is a talk and news radio station. Only available in Las Ventruas for vehicles. Las Ventruas News Radio Hour The Donald Love Show Live At...
data.text:
Radio Stations and Music play a big part in Grand Theft Auto Revolution. Radio Stations can be accesed on the players phone through the Sound Wave app.

810 LVN (Las Ventruas News)[]

810 LVN is a talk and news radio station. Only available in Las Ventruas for vehicles.

Las Ventruas News Radio Hour

The Donald Love Show

Live At Caligula's Palace

Blaine County Radio[]

Blaine County Radio is a public talk radio station. Only available in Blaine County for vehicles.

Bless Your Heart

Blaine County Radio Community Hour

Beyond Insemination

Blue Ark FM[]

Blue Ark FM plays Reggae. Hosted By Damian Marley. Only available in Los Santos & San Fierro for vehicles.

Alpha Blondy - Brigadier Sabari (1981)

Bob Marley - Is This Love (1978)

Bob Marley - One Love (1977)

Bob Marley - Three Little Birds (1977)

Sean Paul - Temperature (2005)

Willie Nelson ft. Toots Hibbert - I'm a Worried Man (2005)

Digital Surge[]

Digital Surge plays a mix electronic music, with focus on Hardsyle and Electronic House & some influence of Dance Punk.

San Tiago Classic Radio (WSTC)[]

San Tiago Classic Radio plays Classic Music from the early 1940's to late 1960's. Hosted by Dion Dimucci. Only available in San Tiago for vehicles.
